original_title: The Magic of Christmas at Disneyland
overview: This Holiday Season you're invited to the jolliest, holliest celebration of them all. Come share in the fun and festivities with all your favorite Disney friends as they prepare The Magic Kingdom for the Holidays. It's the year's most spectacular celebration - and you're our special guests.  Join Mickey, Minnie and the gang in a holiday wonderland of parades, carolers, and a good-old fashioned cheer, while they celebrate the Season as only Disney can.
tagline: Experience the Magic of Disneyland at Christmas!
title: The Magic of Christmas at Disneyland
